summary: Two young, handsome policemen Garlic and Gimmick go undercover in Wong Fei-Hong College to protect a mainland general's daughter.
cast: Takeshi Kaneshiro|Nicky Wu|Charlie Yeung|Li-Wei Chang|Yi-Teng Chang|Yu-Jing Chen|Kuang Ni|Greg Silas|Yat-Fei Wong|Chuan-Chen Yeh
title: Xin zha shi xiong zhui nu zai
